metadata.name: Lonely horse
metadata.description:
Lonely horse

Guraymak district of Bitlis.
Budakli thermal springs in Bitlis are frequented by horses swimming in hot water in winter.
The images that appear at minus degrees in winter are much more than thatâ€¦
Especially in snowy periods, the water temperature in the open-top spa reaches minus 40-50 degrees. With the meeting of cold water and hot water, a wonderful fog view is formed.

Artist: Mine Evren Ertugrul
Edition: 1/1
Date: 30.01.2014
File: jpeg 300 dpi
Location: Bitlis / Turkey
Image Size: 3673x2448
